markdownRemark.html: I have been trying to find a Podcasts on ColdFusion, and I just found out about one called the ColdFusion Podcast by Bryan Kaiser and Michael Haynie. These guys do a great job covering the latest news, blogs and theory surrounding ColdFusion. This is a definite must listen if you listen to Podcasts.

frontmatter.title: The JaxFusion meeting for tomorrow has been canceled
That was Quick, HD DVD is Dead
